    ProcessApplicationInterface
    ProcessApplicationInterface.getRawObject()
    Since getReference() may return a proxy object, this method returs the actual, unproxied object and is meant to be called from the execute(Callable) method.
    Methods in org.cibseven.bpm.application with parameters of type ProcessApplicationInterface
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    ProcessApplicationContext.setCurrentProcessApplication(ProcessApplicationInterface processApplication)
    Declares the context process application for all subsequent engine API invocations until ProcessApplicationContext.clear() is called.
    static <T> T
    ProcessApplicationContext.withProcessApplicationContext(Callable<T> callable, ProcessApplicationInterface processApplication)
    Takes a callable and executes all engine API invocations within that callable in the context of the given process application
